R wrapper for SOFUN

Source: R/run_pmodel_f_bysite.R
run_pmodel_f_bysite.Rd

R wrapper for SOFUN

run_pmodel_f_bysite(
  sitename,
  params_siml,
  siteinfo,
  forcing,
  df_soiltexture,
  params_modl,
  makecheck = TRUE
)

Arguments

sitename

Site name
params_siml

Simulation parameters
siteinfo

Site meta info
forcing

forcing (input) dataframe (returned object by prepare_input_sofun)
df_soiltexture

A list of soil texture parameters
params_modl

Model parameters
makecheck

A logical specifying whether checks are performed to verify forcings.

Details

This is the model
